key.name: history-size
key.summary: The number of items to save in history

key.name: preview-size
key.summary: Amount of visible characters for clipboard items
key.description: The number of characters to display for every clipbaord item in the history menu

key.name: cache-size
key.summary: The allowed size for the registry cache file
key.description: If the cache overflows this limit, the file will be overriden. High limit might cause slowness of shell startup.

key.name: cache-disable
key.summary: Disable the registry cache file and use memory only
key.description: Content is not stored and retrieved from a cache (registry.txt) file. This avoid writing passwords to a plaintext file, but at the cost of persistant history. Your clipboard history is lost after a gnome-shell session ends or the extension is reloaded.
